titles.title: Vet Electronic Trails Act of 2015

To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to check an alien's interactions on and posting of material to the Internet prior to the issuance of a visa, and for other purposes.
Vet Electronic Trails Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Border Security.

bill.summary:
Vet Electronic Trails Act of 2015
This bill amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to require the Department of Homeland Security, before issuing any immigrant or nonimmigrant visa, to check a person's interactions on and posting of material to the Internet (including social media services) in order to ensure that he or she is not a U.S. security threat.
